pages.text: $(li)The Minecart with $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hopper$(/l) is a variant of the common $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecart$(/l).$(br)$(li)The $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hopper$(/l) contained in the Minecart will catch any item that falls on it.
$(li)It will pull items from cointers situated above it too much faster than normal $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hoppers$(/l).
